text: Aloe dewinteri is a species of plant in the genus Aloe. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and rocky areas. == References == * Loots, S. 2004. Aloe dewinteri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Aloe dewinteri
